comment:
* SensorPrivacyManager calls for within the system server
 * @hide

methods.name: public abstract boolean isSensorPrivacyEnabled(int userId, int sensor)
methods.comment: * Get the individual sensor privacy state for a given user.

methods.name: public abstract void addSensorPrivacyListener(int userId, int sensor, OnSensorPrivacyChangedListener listener)
methods.comment:
* Registers a new listener to receive notification when the state of sensor privacy
     * changes.

methods.name: public abstract void addSensorPrivacyListenerForAllUsers(int sensor, OnUserSensorPrivacyChangedListener listener)
methods.comment:
* Registers a new listener to receive notification when the state of sensor privacy
     * changes for any user.

methods.name: public abstract void setPhysicalToggleSensorPrivacy(int userId, int sensor, boolean enable)
methods.comment: *  Set the HW toggle sensor value based on HW switch states, called from InputManagerService

methodNames: public abstract boolean isSensorPrivacyEnabled(int userId, int sensor)
public abstract void addSensorPrivacyListener(int userId, int sensor, OnSensorPrivacyChangedListener listener)
public abstract void addSensorPrivacyListenerForAllUsers(int sensor, OnUserSensorPrivacyChangedListener listener)
public abstract void setPhysicalToggleSensorPrivacy(int userId, int sensor, boolean enable)
